::Zardus/Repressor::

Zardus shakes his head. "He will at the conference room," he says, 
walking off toward the conference room and motioning for Najah to 
follow, "But I would like to know why you attacked Squizzy."

He frowns, the Iron Fist intercepting some comm activity near the 
base. Listening to one transmission, his eyes narrow. So, HotRod 
wanted Feline reprogrammed...

"Repressor," he says into his comm, "Go to Feline's position and have 
her report to the lab. If HotRod objects, open fire. The base 
defences will help you."

Pushing a button on his wrist comp, the old Alliance base goes into 
lockdown, the exit and all the blast doors closing.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Repressor lands near Feline as he recieves Zardus' orders.

"Zardus wants you to report to the lab, he told me to make sure you 
get there."




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lady Hawk looked straight at Zardus, he was getting cocky. He 
didn't think
> she could do any damage while she was wrapped up. He was wrong. If 
she were
> to open her mouth and shriek right now the Alliance would be 
looking for a
> new leader. Unfortunately that also meant that Veratis would be 
looking for
> a new daughter.
> 
> "What exactly is it you'd like to know?" she asked knowing he heald 
all the
> cards. She had to run a bluff and hope to cut her losses. "Have the
> invertabrate release me and I'll tell you everything."
